meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>folding fan</kanji> <kanji>wind</kanji> <kanji>machine</kanji> is a machine that blows wind like a folding fan. That's an <vocabulary>electric fan</vocabulary> or an <vocabulary>electronic fan</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Careful of the rendaku.
